summary: The contact owns a 2018 Keystone Montana equipped with Sailun Tires, Tire Line: S637, Tire Size: ST235/80/R16, Dot Number: 1YJ276PLA. The contact stated that the RV was taken in for an alignment after purchasing new tires. The contact stated while driving at an undisclosed speed, the low tire pressure message displayed. The contact pulled over to inspect the tires and noticed that the tread was low on the passenger’s side rear tire. The contact replaced the tire with the spare and continued to driving to his destination. The tire was replaced with a new tire however, after replacing the tire, the contact was driving when the low tire pressure message on the driver’s side rear tire was displayed. The contact inspected the tire and became aware that the tread was extremely worn and was separated from the tire. The spare tire was placed on the trailer and the vehicle was taken to the dealer for the tire to be replaced. The tire was replaced. The manufacturer was notified of the failure. The failure mileage was 2,500.
